name: Genetic screening for regulating neuronal ECM assembly in cultured hippocampal neurons.
citation: Park, Sungjin  (2025) Genetic screening for regulating neuronal ECM assembly in cultured hippocampal neurons (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001446/draft
description: The application of HaloTag-Hapln1 (H-Link) derived from HEK293T cells to cultured hippocampal neurons reveals the assembly level of H-Link on neurons (CH3: red). Expression of a candidate gene (i.e. IGSF8 or PTPRD) tother with GFP construct shows the transfected neurons (CH2: greeen). MAP2 staining (CH1: magenta) and DAPI (CH4: blue) show neurons and all cells, respectively.
